ExpandableListView.ExpandableListContext.FullName: public ExpandableListView.ExpandableListContextMenuInfo (View targetView, long packedPosition, long id)

ClassDesc: Extra menu information specific to an @B_android#widget#ExpandableListView_E@ provided to the @B_android#view#View#OnCreateContextMenuListener#onCreateContextMenu_E@ callback when a context menu is brought up for this AdapterView.
